author: Alex Wickham
title: Everyone In The UK Is Now On Full Coronavirus Lockdown
description: "If you don’t follow the rules the police will have the powers to enforce them," the prime minister warned in a televised statement from Downing Street. View Entire Post ›
content: Boris Johnson has ordered a full lockdown of the UK in a dramatic escalation of the governments fight against the coronavirus authorising police to fine Britons who leave their homes for non-essential reasons, closing all shops selling non-essential goods, ba… [+3046 chars]
